001.prompt: mountain range made of prisms bending sunlight into wild colors, extreme close-up with stretched perspective, unrealistic lens, angled view through a broken side window, subject offset and cropped, jumping midair at diagonal angle, limbs offset, subject cropped, viewed from a crack in the ground, subject half-cropped above, asymmetrical, shadows cast in conflicting directions,

scenes.text:
なぜ

002.prompt: (Su_MCraft_AP_Ep81:0.65), 1girl, casual outfit, sipping coffee in morning light, soft smile, tight face crop, expressive eyes, detailed makeup, angled from one cheek, soft perspective, hand reaching toward the camera softly, background blurred to focus sharply on eyes, light source behind creating glow around hair,

scenes.text: 優しさは恋愛の“決定打”にならない

「親密な関係」があり、

003.prompt: (Su_MCraft_AP_Ep81:0.65), 1girl, school uniform, sunlight through classroom window, relaxed expression, tight face crop, expressive eyes, detailed makeup, looking past the camera, not directly at viewer, gaze lowered, reflective mood, background blurred to focus sharply on eyes, face half in soft shadow, delicate contrast,

scenes.text: 親切や思いやりは後者で評価されやすいが、

魅力や刺激が優先される傾向がある。

004.prompt: (Su_MCraft_AP_Ep81:0.65), humanoid woman with soft animal features, white fur ears, sharp eyes, glowing forest background, upper half body, elegant posture, cinematic feel, angled from one cheek, soft perspective, arms gently behind back, posture upright, face positioned off-center with balanced lighting, light refracted through semi-transparent glass,

005.prompt: owl folded from shimmering paper, unfolding mid-flight, trails of ink in the air, distant shot, tiny subject, wide surreal background, top-down angle with subject placed off-center, avoids symmetry, climbing diagonally across a wall, angle from below-left, scene cut across diagonally with light or shadow, subject floats across at edge, lighting from two contradictory directions,
